result.eng: Gaudí's buildings are a little strange.
result.ga: Tá foirgnimh de chuid Gaudí rud beag ait
result.orig: Tá foirgnimh de chuid Gaudí rud beag ait
result.html: Tá foirgnimh de chuid Gaudí rud beag aitGaudí's buildings are a little strange.
result.ponchtml: Tá foirgniṁ de ċuid Gaudí rud beag aitGaudí's buildings are a little strange.

result.eng: People started being evacuated from tall buildings around the country such as Sears Tower in Chicago.
result.ga: Tosaíodh ag aslonnú daoine as foirgnimh mhóra timpeall na tíre mar Túr Sears in Siceágo
result.orig: Tosaíodh ag aslonnú daoine as foirgnimh mhóra timpeall na tíre mar Túr Sears in Siceágo
result.html: Tosaíodh ag aslonnú daoine as foirgnimh mhóra timpeall na tíre mar Túr Sears in SiceágoPeople started being evacuated from tall buildings around the country such as Sears Tower in Chicago.
result.ponchtml: Tosaíoḋ ag aslonnú daoine as foirgniṁ ṁóra timpeall na tíre mar Túr Sears in SiceágoPeople started being evacuated from tall buildings around the country such as Sears Tower in Chicago.

result.eng: The two Trade Centre buildings were on fire.
result.ga: Bhí dhá fhoirgneamh an Lárionad Trádála trí thine
result.orig: Bhí dhá fhoirgneamh an Lárionad Trádála trí thine
result.html: Bhí dhá fhoirgneamh an Lárionad Trádála trí thineThe two Trade Centre buildings were on fire.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí ḋá ḟoirgneaṁ an Lárionad Trádála trí ṫineThe two Trade Centre buildings were on fire.
